Name: just manage markers
Author: zbee
Punchline:
A tool for making simple changes to waymarks.
...And more complex changes, with powerful bulk waymark preset features.
Description:
This plugin requires the `Waymark Preset Plugin`.

This plugin seeks to simplify everything around waymarks down to the point that they're truly a tool again, and not ever in your way.
In this toolboox are the following utilities to make setting up and managing waymarks easier.
- Swapping positions of individual marks
- Swapping positions of letter and number marks
- Square up marks (optionally with an anchor marker)
- Re-orient marks to your preferred North
- Generating boilerplate markers for new content
- Adjusting set groups of markers around the arena
- Picking a position to place a marker after combat is over
- Reset markers before combat starts to the one you placed
- Always apply a certain waymark preset when you load into an instance
